name: Duggy Adventure
description:
Duggy is a small dog looking for his lost friend.

You will help him to pass this mysterious forest.

Hope you'll like it, I had fun making it even if I didnt have much time to polish it as mush as I wanted.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Jump:  Space

Credits

Game, sound effects,  characters and interactable objects design and animations : StefGrizzly

Background and tilesets: from an asset pack that I bought, I don't know when and where.

Music: Esther Abrami
